mean_cn: n. 调节，条件作用，整修，健身训练
mean_en: the act or process of training a person or animal to do something or to behave in a certain way in a particular situation
word_etyma: condition训练，使适应+ ing名词后缀 → conditioning训练
sentence: These conditioning exercises will make your body stronger.
sentence_trans: 这些调节训练能使你的身体更强壮。
